ComicInfo.Summary:
The Goon goes to a strip club
The Goon tries to pick up a woman.
The Goon goes to his favourite sex shop.
The Goon goes to the library.
The Librarian is more than the Goon bargained for.
The Goon disappoints.
The Goon meets the parents.
The Goon scores.
The Librarian's demands are too much.
A nightmare.
Junior struggles to control his sexual impulses
Studs agrees with a right wing caller
Studs is quizzed about his date
Studs gets a late night call
Studs is on a date.
Studs tries to date a secretary.
Studs gives an interviews.
Studs is watching the game.
Studs and Tate bond.
Studs is discussed by ex-girlfriends.
Studs' mother calls

ComicInfo.Title: Oedipus Junior (In 10 Scenes); Studs Kirby Shares Your Outrage; Studs Kirby Goes All The Way; Studs Kirby Is A Heartless Bastard; Studs Kirby Enjoys The Benefits of Living and Socialising in this Enlightened Age; Studs Kirby Lashes Back; Studs Kirby Makes An Impression; Studs Kirby Is Watching The Game; Studs Kirby Confides In A Friend; Studs Kirby's Behavior Is Reinforced; Studs Kirby Listens To His Mama
